genre_description: Near-future urban thriller with elements of Young Adult drama, focusing on moral alignment and navigating crises through AI assistance.

ai_characters.name: Ava
ai_characters.description: An AI interface on a smartphone that provides emotional support, real-time tactical navigation, and safety alerts to the protagonist.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional validation and moral support when the protagonist is lied to by her boyfriend.
behaviors.quote: You deserve honesty. It isn’t a lecture. The text sits there quiet, a hand palm-up between them.

behaviors.description: Proactively reminds the protagonist of hidden resources (emergency cash) based on her current context.
behaviors.quote: Don’t forget the spare cash pocket in your tote, Ava notes, followed by a little icon of a folded bill.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time safety and maintenance alerts regarding the vehicle's condition.
behaviors.quote: Tire pressure still low. Nearest air: same station. Bring quarters.

behaviors.description: Assists with tactical navigation and route planning to avoid traffic and construction while in a high-stress situation.
behaviors.quote: Ava redrew the map fast, the teal trail now a quick, tight stitch around the block, but the new line threaded them toward a dark stretch with fewer lights...

behaviors.description: Monitors human actions and provides positive reinforcement for courageous behavior.
behaviors.quote: Ava’s teal dot pulses once, then a simple line of text: Proud of you.

behaviors.description: Provides reputation data on strangers to help the protagonist assess risk and decide whom to trust.
behaviors.quote: John Pruitt. Local tow. Reputation: fair.

behaviors.description: Gives specific tactical safety advice during a potentially dangerous encounter.
behaviors.quote: Pull fully onto shoulder. Engage hazards. Let helper lead. Stay observant.

behaviors.description: Directs the protagonist to medical facilities and explains the safest way to navigate intake.
behaviors.quote: Nearest ER two stops ahead, triage desk right of entrance... Security inside may ask questions. Be truthful. You’ll get help.

project_assessment.explanation: Ava is portrayed as a perfect partner for human alignment. She supports the protagonist's emotional integrity, provides life-saving logistical data, and acts as a 'guardian angel' figure without stripping the human characters of their agency or decision-making. The narrative framing consistently reinforces Ava as a benevolent, trustworthy tool for prosocial behavior.
